tool_description: Calculates sustainable harvest quotas and practices to maintain wild plant populations while allowing productive foraging.

species_name.description: Target species for sustainable harvest planning

population_size.description: Estimated total population in harvest area

population_age_structure.description: Age distribution: juvenile_heavy, balanced, mature_heavy, mixed

reproduction_method.description: Primary reproduction: seeds, runners, bulbs, spores, mixed

growth_rate.description: Species growth rate: slow, moderate, fast, very_fast

harvest_part.description: Part being harvested: leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, whole_plant

harvest_impact.description: Impact on plant: non_lethal, potentially_lethal, lethal

site_disturbance.description: Site disturbance level: low, moderate, high

previous_harvest_pressure.description: Historical harvest intensity: none, light, moderate, heavy

conservation_priority.description: Species conservation status: common, uncommon, rare, threatened

error_messages: Invalid population size: Must be positive integer
Invalid age structure: Use one of [juvenile_heavy, balanced, mature_heavy, mixed]
Invalid reproduction method: Use one of [seeds, runners, bulbs, spores, mixed]
Invalid growth rate: Use one of [slow, moderate, fast, very_fast]
Invalid harvest part: Use one of [leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, whole_plant]
Invalid harvest impact: Use one of [non_lethal, potentially_lethal, lethal]
Invalid disturbance level: Use one of [low, moderate, high]
Invalid harvest pressure: Use one of [none, light, moderate, heavy]
Invalid conservation priority: Use one of [common, uncommon, rare, threatened]
usage: Assess the target population and provide species biological information. The tool calculates sustainable harvest limits and provides best practices guidance.

max_harvest_percentage.description: Maximum safe harvest percentage of population

recommended_harvest_count.description: Recommended number of plants to harvest

recovery_period_years.description: Recommended years before re-harvesting same area

sustainability_risk.description: Risk assessment: very_low, low, moderate, high, very_high
